text: Lianna is a 1983 lesbian-themed drama movie. The title character is the wife of a college professor teaching at a University in New Jersey. This woman takes up child psychology with a friend named Sandy. Lianna received several positive reviews from critics. The movie was released January 1983 in the United States. title: Lianna
